name: Running out of minions
description:
Multiplayer VS game made in about a day for LDJAM. Ludum entry.

Switch the city tiles and guide your dumb minions to conquer other companies. Your technological empire must stand!

Expanded instructions: You can charge the target (the HQ your minions are trying to attack) and switch a tile with another one right next to it to create a path. Your minions are kinda dumb, don't expect much from them. Escape resets the game.

Fun fact: We made two one-day-jams in a single weekend.

art & design: Isabel Tallos

code & design: Ludipe
